title: Cant See Stats?
body: I cant seem to be able to see my ranked stats which i was able to do last season.  http://imgur.com/uZFVtn4

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/7JOlAhZh-bug-cant-click-on-see-more-stats

Same thing for me. The link above is my post that i made almost 2 weeks ago, and others also have the same problem. Funny how riot responds to a guy who wants 1 rp but not a bug that many people have. 

My post has 1k + views and still no help

Hey HunterOfAlpha,

This is a known bug and will be fixed over the next couple patches. Check out this thread for some things they are working on; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select

-DTN

Hey there,

This has currently been acknowledged by Riot and they are working on a fix, see [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) thread for more information, should be fixed within the next few patches.

>The “See more stats” button in the Leagues tab of the Profile page has been disabled for both individuals and teams.
